name: Off-channel Storage Features
functionStatement: Wetlands and storage features store floodwater, recharge groundwater, sustain baseflow, and provide low-velocity habitat.
descriptionMarkdown: Side channels/beaver ponds/oxbows connect during moderate floods, providing off-channel storage and habitat.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Map side channels and oxbows and verify whether they connect at about bankfull stage. Use simple inundation mapping if needed.

inputs.label: Off-channel Storage Features
inputs.helpMarkdown: High resolution aerial imagery; Field photos; Brief field recon; Historical evidence

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Good: Multiple off-channel features connect in moderate floods. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

levels.label: Suboptimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: Partial connection or fewer off-channel areas. (Suggested index range 0.50-0.69)

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: Only large floods access these areas, or off-channel areas are minimal. (Suggested index range 0.30-0.49)

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Poor: Off-channel features are mostly gone or permanently cut off. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.29)

sourceMetadata.metricDataSource: High resolution aerial imagery; Field photos; Brief field recon; Historical evidence

bin1.name: Poor
bin1.desc: Off-channel features are mostly gone or permanently cut off.

bin2.name: Fair
bin2.desc: Partial connection or fewer off-channel areas. / Only large floods access these areas, or off-channel areas are minimal.

bin3.name: Good
bin3.desc: Multiple off-channel features connect in moderate floods.
